text:
Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Achievers http://www.achievers.com | ONSITE | Developers

My company has built a kick-ass employee recognition platform and we're looking for developers of all shapes and sizes.

Please don't apply if you're a jerk though, we don't hire assholes. He are some of our current requisitions:

Software Development Lead | Toronto, Ontario

Senior Manager, Software Engineering | Toronto, Ontario

Sr. Software Developer | Toronto, Ontario

Sr. Front-End Developer | Toronto, Ontario

Sr. UX Designer | Toronto, Ontario

Android Developer | Toronto, Ontario

Full details at http://app.jobvite.com/m?3kImyiwJ
